p.k: The Bad Plus plays 'Science Fiction' by Ornette Coleman - Jazz a la Villette. Réalisateurs: Samuel Thiebaut (2015).
p.d:
The Bad Plus Ethan Iverson - piano Reid Anderson - bass Dave King - drums invites - Tim Berne - alto saxophone Sam Newsome - soprano saxophone Ron Miles - trumpet
Recorded on September 12nd 2015 at La Villette jazz festival, Cité de la Musique, Philharmonie 2 TV Director, Samuel Thiebaut
